name: Day 2: Smart Animate Matching Layers
description:
Welcome to day 2 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! This challenge is focused on Smart Animate Matching Layers and using it to recreate a tab menu. In the file you will find:

  1. A Gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples demonstrating other applications of the feature


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique prototype using Smart Animate Matching Layers. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
